Terms of Service

Last updated: January 2026

Agreement to Terms

By accessing or using Figgle Media's website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access our services.

Services

Figgle Media provides digital marketing services including but not limited to:

  • Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
  • Website Design and Development
  • Social Media Marketing
  • Pay-Per-Click Advertising Management
  • Content Marketing

The specific services provided will be outlined in your service agreement or proposal.

Payment Terms

Services are billed monthly in advance unless otherwise specified in your service agreement. Payment is due upon receipt of invoice. We accept major credit cards, ACH transfers, and checks.

Late payments may result in suspension of services after a 10-day grace period and written notice.

Cancellation Policy

You may cancel your services at any time with 30 days written notice. Upon cancellation:

  • All work completed will be delivered to you
  • Access credentials for all accounts will be transferred
  • Any outstanding invoices become due immediately
  • No refunds are provided for partial months

Intellectual Property

Upon full payment, you own all deliverables created specifically for your business, including:

  • Website designs and code
  • Written content and copy
  • Graphics and images created for your brand

Figgle Media retains the right to showcase work in our portfolio unless otherwise agreed in writing.

Client Responsibilities

You agree to:

  • Provide timely feedback and approvals
  • Supply accurate information about your business
  • Maintain current contact information
  • Respond to requests within reasonable timeframes
  • Comply with all applicable laws regarding your business and advertising

Limitation of Liability

Figgle Media shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of our services. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid for services in the three months preceding the claim.

No Guarantees

While we strive for the best possible results, we cannot guarantee specific outcomes such as:

  • Specific search engine rankings
  • Specific traffic or lead volumes
  • Specific return on investment

Search engine algorithms and market conditions are outside our control. We commit to following industry best practices and being transparent about our efforts and results.

Modifications to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through our website. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

Governing Law

These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of North Carolina, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

Contact Information

For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

Email: Figglemedia@gmail.com
Phone: (681) 307-7514
